# SRTextInputSession

**Class**

The characters a user types for a particular keyboard.

## Declaration

```swift
class SRTextInputSession
```

## Overview

The framework instantiates a new instance of this class every time the keyboard displays after dismissal.

## Identifying the Session

- **sessionIdentifier**: A unique identifier for the keyboard session.

## Timing Text Input

- **duration**: The length of time, in seconds, that the session spans.

## Inspecting Text Source

- **sessionType**
- **SRTextInputSession.SessionType**: Methods to input text during a session.

## Inspecting Text Input

- **textInputSessions**: The text input session types that occur during application usage.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
